wikipedia_page.main: Adrian Stephen Breton (4 October 1962 – 11 June 2007) was a British sports shooter from Guernsey. He competed at the 1988 and 1992 Summer Olympics. He also competed in the Commonwealth Games, winning a gold, silver and bronze medal.

response: * Adrian Breton (1962–2007), 1990 Commonwealth Games gold medal, men's rapid fire pistol
